oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Therapy for reproductive problems in the postpartum cow
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Momont, Harry
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: postpartum
dairy cow
reproductive efficiency
RFM
endometritis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Many problems beset the postpartum dairy cow and all of them may potentially decrease reproductive efficiency. This brief review will deal with retained fetal membranes (RFM) and metritis/endometritis and discuss various treatment approaches in light of recent research. It should be noted here that research often does not translate into obvious clinical recommendations. Two recent reviews dealing with RFM/metritis cite a combined total of 241 reports without reaching definitive conclusions about therapy. We will proceed from this rather uncertain foundation.
